triples.name: Language model
triples.relevance: TimeLMs extends language model techniques with temporal specialization for Twitter data analysis

triples.name: X (social network)
triples.relevance: TimeLMs is specialized for diachronic Twitter data, making Twitter the primary data source

triples.name: Incremental learning
triples.relevance: The continual learning strategy employed in TimeLMs is fundamentally an incremental learning approach

triples.name: Named-entity recognition
triples.relevance: The paper analyzes how TimeLMs handle trends and peaks involving specific named entities

triples.name: Concept drift
triples.relevance: TimeLMs explicitly addresses concept drift in Twitter data, showing how models adapt to evolving language

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: TimeLMs contributes to NLP by introducing temporal specialization for language models

triples.name: Diachrony and synchrony
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a novel diachronic approach to language models, focusing on temporal evolution of language on Twitter
